changeSet.author: Tarif Halabi
changeSet.createView: select year(flight_date) as id, year(flight_date)+0 as year, round(sum(day_dual),1) as day_dual, round(sum(day_solo),1) as day_solo, round(sum(instrument_flight_sim),1) as instrument_flight_sim, round(sum(instrument_imc), 1) as instrument_imc, sum(instrument_no_ifr_appr) as instrument_no_ifr_appr, round(sum(instrument_simulated),1) as instrument_simulated, round(sum(night_dual),1) as night_dual, round(sum(night_solo),1) as night_solo, sum(tos_ldgs_day) as tos_ldgs_day, sum(tos_ldgs_night) as tos_ldgs_night, round(sum(x_country_day),1) as x_country_day, round(sum(x_country_night),1) as x_country_night from flight_log group by id, year
